product_name: The North Face Sereyna Rain Jacket - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The North Face Sereyna Rain jacket for women is just the thing to complete your outerwear collection. Its formfitting style and waterproof nylon keep you covered in any scenario. Waterproof HyVent(R) 2.5-layer construction keeps you dry and protected from the rain; stowable hood adjusts with drawcord. 2 front pockets and 1 internal media pocket; internal drawcord at waist; elastic cuffs and hem; welted zip hand pockets. Closeout.
short_description: The North Face Sereyna Rain jacket for women is just the thing to complete your outerwear collection. Its formfitting style and waterproof nylon keep you covered in any scenario.
